text: import java.net.Â¥*; import java.io.*; public class SocketAdd { public static void main(String[] args) { try { Socket socket = new Socket(); SocketAddress address = new InetSocketAddress("time.nist.gov", 13); socket.connect (address) ; InputStream in = socket.getInputStream() ; int c; while ((c = in.read())!= -1) System.out.print ((char)c); socket.close() ;} catch (IOException ex) { System.err.println(ex) ; } } }
